title: How to change the new draft champion select sound?
body:
Title.

Basically I wanted to change the current draft pick champion select sound to the old one, you know, the classic draft pick sound since I find it sound better than our current one.

I've did some research and apparently the audio files are now located in "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.227\deploy\mod\tbd\assets\audio" and there's tons of em, anyone knows the right one?

Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
Unfortunately, because this modification requires altering the game files, it's not something we support. Making these types of changes can really break stuff in the client, so it can be pretty risky.

Let me know if you have any questions.
